CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's bring your custom Vans to life! Fill out the form below to start your personalized shoe journey.

STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Unleash your creativity and craft the perfect pair of custom Vans sneakers
FEATURE_1_BODY: Start with a blank slate and design your dream Vans from the ground up. Choose from classic styles like Old Skool, Authentic, or Slip-On.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Explore a vibrant palette of colors and patterns to make your Vans truly unique. Mix and match to your heart's content.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Select from premium materials including canvas, suede, and leather to craft the perfect look and feel for your custom Vans.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Unleash your creativity with our advanced design tools. Add graphics, text, or upload your own artwork to create one-of-a-kind Vans.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Choose from classic waffle soles to modern comfort-enhanced options. Customize colors and patterns for a complete look from top to bottom.
FEATURE_6_BODY: See your custom Vans come to life with our 3D preview feature. Rotate, zoom, and visualize your creation before you buy.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about creating your custom Vans
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the Vans customization process work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app guides you through a step-by-step process where you can choose your shoe style, colors, patterns, and add personal touches like custom text or images. You'll see a real-time preview of your design as you create.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What styles of Vans can I customize?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: You can customize a wide range of Vans styles including Classic Slip-Ons, Old Skools, Authentics, Sk8-His, and Era models. The available styles may vary based on current inventory.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How long does it take to receive my custom Vans?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Typically, custom Vans take 2-3 weeks to produce and ship. This timeframe may vary during peak seasons or due to unforeseen circumstances. You'll receive updates on your order status throughout the process.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I return or exchange my custom Vans?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Due to the personalized nature of custom Vans, we cannot accept returns or exchanges unless there's a manufacturing defect. We recommend double-checking your design and size before placing your order.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is there an additional cost for customization?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, there is typically a small additional fee for customization, which varies depending on the complexity of your design. The exact price will be shown before you complete your purchase.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Van Creation
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What types of vans can I create with this app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app allows you to design and customize a wide range of vans, including cargo vans, passenger vans, camper vans, and custom conversion vans. You can tailor each van to your specific needs and preferences.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does the van creation process work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The process is simple and user-friendly. Start by choosing a base van model, then use our intuitive interface to customize the exterior, interior, features, and accessories. You can preview your design in real-time and make adjustments as needed.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I save and share my van designs?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! You can save multiple designs to your account, allowing you to revisit and modify them later. You can also share your creations with friends, family, or on social media directly from the app.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Are the vans I create actually buildable?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our app is designed with real-world feasibility in mind. We partner with van manufacturers and custom builders to ensure that the designs you create can be brought to life. You can even request quotes for your custom van builds directly through the app.

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: What Our Vans Creators Are Saying
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Join thousands of satisfied customers who have designed their dream Vans
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer! I've always wanted to design my own Vans, and now I can do it with ease. The customization options are endless!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I'm amazed at how user-friendly this app is. Creating my personalized Vans has never been more fun or intuitive. Highly recommended!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The level of detail and creativity possible with this app is mind-blowing. I've created multiple pairs, and each one is uniquely me!
